ivardefs.name: check
ivardefs.desc: FHIRPath expression  - must be true or the mapping engine throws an error instead of completing.

ivardefs.name: condition
ivardefs.desc: FHIRPath expression  - must be true or the rule does not apply.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: Type or variable this rule applies to.

ivardefs.name: listMode
ivardefs.desc: How to handle the list mode for this element.

ivardefs.name: max
ivardefs.desc: Specified maximum cardinality for the element - a number or a "*". This is optional; if present, it acts an implicit check on the input content (* just serves as documentation; it's the default value).

ivardefs.name: min
ivardefs.desc: Specified minimum cardinality for the element. This is optional; if present, it acts an implicit check on the input content.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Specified type for the element. This works as a condition on the mapping - use for polymorphic elements.

ivardefs.name: variable
ivardefs.desc: Named context for field, if a field is specified.
